matcher.options: Average Time To Response Last Month

properties.value: AVG Time to Respond - Last Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeEpoch(A.AlarmDate) 
		, DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,AC.DateCreated) AS 'Average Time To Response'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND $__timeFilter(A.AlarmDate)

SELECT $__timeEpoch(A.AlarmDate) 
		, DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,AC.DateCreated) AS 'Average Time To Response Last Month'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND  [AlarmDate] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

matcher.options: Average Time To Close Last Month

properties.value: AVG Time To Close  Last Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeEpoch(A.AlarmDate) 
		, (SELECT DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,IC.DateClosed) FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" IC WHERE IC.CaseID=AC.CaseID) AS 'Average Time To Close'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person P
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND $__timeFilter(A.AlarmDate)

SELECT $__timeEpoch(A.AlarmDate) 
		, (SELECT DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,IC.DateClosed) FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" IC WHERE IC.CaseID=AC.CaseID) AS 'Average Time To Close Last Month'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person P
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND [AlarmDate] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

options.content:
# SOC KPI 
___
1. The analyst should response to Alarm with **15 minute**.
2. The analyst should close the Alarm after investigation within **60 minute**.

matcher.options: Average Time To Response Last Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeEpoch(A.AlarmDate) 
		, DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,AC.DateCreated) AS 'Average Time To Response'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND $__timeFilter(A.AlarmDate)

SELECT $__timeEpoch(A.AlarmDate) 
		, DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,AC.DateCreated) AS 'Average Time To Response Last Month'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND  [AlarmDate] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

panels.title: Total Average Time To Response (15 Min)

matcher.options: Average Time To Close Last Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeEpoch(A.AlarmDate) 
		, (SELECT DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,IC.DateClosed) FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" IC WHERE IC.CaseID=AC.CaseID) AS 'Average Time To Close'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person P
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND $__timeFilter(A.AlarmDate)

SELECT $__timeEpoch(A.AlarmDate) 
		, (SELECT DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,IC.DateClosed) FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" IC WHERE IC.CaseID=AC.CaseID) AS 'Average Time To Close Last Month'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person P
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND [AlarmDate] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

panels.title: Total Average Time To Close (60 Min)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
       DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,AC.DateCreated) AS 'Average Time To Response'
		 , (SELECT DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,IC.DateClosed) FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" IC WHERE IC.CaseID=AC.CaseID) AS 'Average Time To Close'
		 , (SELECT COUNT(*) from LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID Where ar.AlarmType = 5 AND $__timeFilter(A.AlarmDate)) AS 'Count of Alerts'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person P
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND $__timeFilter(A.AlarmDate)

SELECT
       DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,AC.DateCreated) AS 'Average Time To Response'
		 , (SELECT DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,IC.DateClosed) FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" IC WHERE IC.CaseID=AC.CaseID) AS 'Average Time To Close'
		 , (SELECT COUNT(*) from LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID Where ar.AlarmType = 5 AND A.AlarmDate BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))) AS 'Count of Alerts'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person P
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND A.AlarmDate BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

SELECT DISTINCT
	count(DISTINCT C.CaseNumber) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] C
Where C.CaseStatusID IN (3,4,5)
    --AND CT.TagID <> 28
    AND $__timeFilter(C.DateCreated)

SELECT DISTINCT
	count(DISTINCT C.CaseNumber) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] C
Where C.CaseStatusID IN (3,4,5)
    --AND CT.TagID <> 28
    AND C.DateCreated BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Open(Created)' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 3
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Resolved' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 5
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Mitigated' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 4
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Open(Created)' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
    LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 3
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Resolved' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 5
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Mitigated' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 4
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT Count(*) As 'Cloased Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateInserted]) and AlarmStatus >= 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Open Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
 $__timeFilter([DateInserted]) and AlarmStatus < 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Open Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
 [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo())) and AlarmStatus < 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Closed Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo())) and AlarmStatus >= 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Total of Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateInserted])

SELECT Count(*) As 'Count of Closed Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateInserted]) and AlarmStatus >= 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Total of Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

SELECT Count(*) As 'Count of Closed Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo())) and AlarmStatus >= 4

USE [LogRhythm_LogMart];
SELECT
  [Avg MPS] = CAST(SUM(CAST(CountProcessedLogs as BIGINT)) AS real) / CAST(DATEDIFF(ss,$__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) as BIGINT),
	[Max MPS] = CAST(MAX(CountProcessedLogs) AS float) / 60.0
FROM
	[dbo].StatsDeploymentCountsMinute with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter(StatDate);

select 
  [Logs Processed] = SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint)),
  [Events Forwarded By LMs] = SUM(cast(CountEventsForwarded as bigint))
  --[Alarms] = SUM(cast(CountAlarms as bigint))
from 
  LogRhythm_LogMart.dbo.StatsDeploymentCountsHour with (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StatDate)

SELECT
 count(*) as Cases
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

select
  [Logs Processed] = SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint)),
  [Events Forwarded By LMs] = SUM(cast(CountEventsForwarded as bigint))
  --[Alarms] = SUM(cast(CountAlarms as bigint))
from 
  LogRhythm_LogMart.dbo.StatsDeploymentCountsHour with (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StatDate)

SELECT
 count(*) as Cases
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.MsgSource with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  RecordStatus = 1 AND Name NOT LIKE 'AI Engine%'

SELECT
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.HOST with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  RecordStatus = 1 AND Name NOT LIKE 'AI Engine%'
